faq.question: How do I place an order?
faq.answer: You can place an order through our website, by calling us, or by sending an email request.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept cash, credit cards, bank transfers, and electronic payment systems.

faq.question: What is the delivery cost?
faq.answer: Delivery cost depends on the region and weight of the item. Please contact a manager for detailed information.

faq.question: What is the delivery time?
faq.answer: Delivery time depends on the region. Within the city - 1-2 days, nationwide - 3-7 business days.

faq.question: Can I return the product?
faq.answer: Yes, you can return the product within 14 days of purchase, provided the product and packaging are in original condition.
